subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova overcame five double faults and 33 unforced errors to beat Dominika Cibulkova, 7-6 (7), 6-3, in the final of the Bausch & Lomb Championships at Amelia Island, Fla. It was Sharapova’s first title on clay and her third over all in 2008.
